<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="490" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">…</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">an</word>
		<word type="JJ">off-screen</word>
		<word type="NN">persona</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="RB">Globally</word>
			<word type="JJ">Conscious</word>
			<word type="NNP-LOC">Earth</word>
			<word type="NNP">Mother</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="CC">and</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">an</word>
		<word type="JJ">aggressive</word>
		<word type="JJ">on-screen</word>
		<word type="NN">embodiment</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PP">
		<word type="IN">of</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBP">Kali</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=",">,</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NNP">Goddess</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NN">Destruction</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","1"
